title: Hamlet: Poem Unlimited
description: In Harold Bloom's New York Times bestselling The Invention of the Human , the world's foremost literary critic theorized on the authorship of the historic play  Hamlet . In this engaging new stand-alone work, he offers a full and warmly personal account of the play itself, explores its extraordinary impact throughout the history of western literature, and seeks to uncover the mystery at its heart.
author: Harold Bloom
